page.title: 01WATCH LAW, DUNBAR COMMON
page.content: An upland moor forming the north edge of the Lannermuir Hills, from which the Dunbar coastal plain is visible. Slopes to the north-east at which point small farm settlements lie in more sheltered areas. Pockets of woodland only in this north-east corner. Block is traversed by the 'Herring Road', an ancient upland footpath, still popular with walkers, running between Dunbar and the Scottish Borders and beyond. Predominant land use is hill farming. Valuable nature conservation site in Woodhall Burn Valley.
